channel.title: Ichigo Zengetsu
channel.description:
First sword with meta. [IMG]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_Taezh4ULlfw/SOmoDgvqsqI/AAAAAAAAAI8/9VCvCbBbnTg/s400/Bleach-Kurosaki-Ichigo-Zangetsu.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/zenget1.png[/img]
um the wireframe looks funky lol, im pretty sure i fucked it up when i was modeling it.
[IMG]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/zenget2.png[/img]

item.title: Ichigo Zengetsu
item.dc:creator: @migetman40 migetman40
item.description:
@migetman40 wrote:

[quote=“Timberpig., post:2, topic:358096”]haha that pretty sweet.
but it’s (full) name it Tsensa zangetsu (spelling?)
but i cant imagine an anim for a char to hold that ingame :P[/quote]
not flaming but its not tensa zangetsu its just zangetsu, tensa is bankai name =).

and btw the blade should be bent back but really good for first model =)

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo Zengetsu

item.description:
@rosejuice wrote:

if you see ichigo’s weapon, its accually straight not bent inwards… you can reduce polly count and recreate this easy and it’ll probs look better too, no offence lols… + i already made this. O_o

item.title: Ichigo Zengetsu
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:14, topic:358096”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=454608.msg3429138#msg3429138 date=1292182551]

haha that pretty sweet.
but it’s (full) name it Tsensa zangetsu (spelling?)
but i cant imagine an anim for a char to hold that ingame

You are wrong, It is Zangestu, Tensa Zangetsu is Ichigo’s Bankai form of Zangetsu, which is not as “fat” as this one, its skinnier and fully black, with red diamonds on the handle

<3 BLEACH <3 (& my gf)

Don’t gravedig.
[/quote]
Don’t comment on his gravedig, just let the topic die instead.
Anyone replying under this line is a raging homosexual

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/quote]
You should of sent him a personal message instead of bumping the topic.
[size=1pt]Coming out of the closet yo?[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Ichigo Zengetsu
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

To start, its really flat. Next up, the handle is way over poly. That should be a sinks square.
Last, halfway through the back of the blade, the wireframe indents forward. Fix those things, and while it is ur first, try for something with a little more depth.

Read full topic
